channel.title: Anyone know how to edit .SWF in Flash Pro 8
channel.description:
Hi.
I Recently found a template I like. The header of it is flash though, and im trying to figure out how to change it. When i try to open it in Flash Pro 8 It just opens in another window and plays. I Cant seem to edit it because it isnt letting me use any of the buttons/commands on the interface.
All I need to do is change some Text. Anyone got an ideas?
Thanks :)

item.title: Anyone know how to edit .SWF in Flash Pro 8
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

You need a flash decompiler, the editable flash file is .fla

And get Flash 8, MX blows.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know how to edit .SWF in Flash Pro 8
